ValidationRule.description: To mark an opportunity as closed lost, some additional information is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advice_Opportunity" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "AdviceFastTrack" ) && ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Closed Lost") && (ISBLANK(Lost_Reason__c)|| ISBLANK(Lost_Notes__c) || ISBLANK(Lost_Date__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To lose an opportunity, you must specify lost date, lost reason, and lost notes.
